pageContext.claim: “And I heard that President Macron said NATO is brain-dead. I think that's very insulting to a lot of different forces, including the man that does a very good job in running NATO. No, it has a great purpose, especially with the fact that NATO is becoming much more flexible, in terms of what it looks at. But I was very surprised.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump routinely attacks NATO and its members and once called it "obsolete," so these comments suggest an unacknowledged flip-flop.
